title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
**Unleash Precision with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse!**

Elevate your desktop experience with the sleek and versatile Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Perfect for both left and right-handed users, this trackball mouse is crafted for precision and comfort, making it an ideal companion for your daily tasks.

**Key Features:**

- **Versatile Connectivity:** Choose between PS/2 or USB connectivity, ensuring seamless integration with your computer setup.
- **300 DPI Accuracy:** Enjoy smooth and accurate cursor movements with 300 DPI precision.
- **Compact Design:** With dimensions of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this trackball mouse is designed to fit comfortably in any workspace.
- **Trackball Technology:** Experience the ease of use with a trackball that allows you to navigate with pinpoint accuracy.
- **Side-to-Side Scrolling:** Effortlessly scroll through documents and web pages with the side-to-side scrolling feature.
- **Two-Button Operation:** Control your computer with ease using the two-button setup, providing you with the functionality you need.
- **Available Colors:** Choose from a striking selection of colors including red, gray, and white to match your desktop aesthetic.

**Why Choose the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse?**

- **Comfort and Ergonomics:** Designed to support both left and right-handed users, this trackball mouse ensures comfort during long hours of use.
- **Enhanced Productivity:** The intuitive design and precision of the trackball make it perfect for tasks requiring accuracy and efficiency.
- **Durable Construction:** Crafted with quality materials, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse delivers reliability and longevity.

**Made in China:** 

Crafted with the same high standards of quality you expect from Logitech, this mouse is designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.
